data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Bình Dương.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bình Dương, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,519,145, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 46 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 36,583 believers in Bình Dương, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Bình Dương that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the En people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, please help the 36,583 believers in the state of Bình Dương to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Bình Dương words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary:
the state of Bình Dương, Vietnam has a population of 1,691,400.

We estimate Bình Dương has 36,583 people who might know Jesus, 135,671 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,519,145 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 36,583 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,654,816 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
